General.Name: Polaris Group
General.Description: Polaris Group, a biotechnology company, focuses on developing anti-cancer therapies. Its lead drug candidate is Pegargiminase (ADI-PEG 20), a biologic in late-stage clinical development for the treatment of a range of cancers, including hepatocellular carcinoma, mesothelioma, pancreatic cancer, non-small cell lung cancer, melanoma, acute myeloid leukemia, and others. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in San Diego, California.
General.Address: 3030 North Rocky Point Drive, Tampa, FL, United States
